title: 12: S6E12 – "Unwelcome Advances" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four spine-chilling tales from authors E.K. Kelly, Wentz Hesselman, Christopher Maxim, and Henry Kuttner, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about haunting humanoids, paranormal personalities, creepy crimes, and abnormal abodes. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
